related_questions.question: The following text is for questions number 12 up to 18. Mrs. White is a teacher. She....( 1)... Geography and Math. At the moment ,she ..( 2) ...in front of the class. They .....( 6 ).... any animals , but they ....( 7 ).. any pets because they live in an appartment    plisss​

answers.answer:

1. teaches.

2. is standing

3. is teaching / is telling

4. lives

5. has

6. love

7. do not have

related_questions.question:
Arrange these jumbled sentences into good order.    26. student - Sarah - is - difigent - a
2 3
4
5
a. 2-1-3-5-4
b. 2-3-5-4-1
c. 2-4-1-3-5
d. 2-5-4-2-1​
Tulisan Arab .innal insaana fii akhsani takwin​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

الْإِنْسٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيْمٍ

Penjelasan:

At Tin: Buah Tin

وَالتِّيْنِ وَالزَّيْتُوْنِ ﴿التين:١

wattiini waz zaituun

1. Demi (buah) Tin dan (buah) Zaitun,

وَطُوْرِ سِيْنِيْنَ ﴿التين:٢

watuuri siiniin

2. demi Gunung Sinai,

وَهٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِيْنِ ﴿التين:٣

wahaadzal baladil amiin

3. dan demi negeri (Mekah) yang aman ini;

لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيْمٍ ﴿التين:٤

laqod kholaqnal insaana fii ahsani taqwiim

4. Sungguh, Kami telah menciptakan manusia dalam bentuk yang sebaik-baiknya,

ثُمَّ رَدَدْنٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سٰفِلِيْنَ ﴿التين:٥

tsumma rodadnaahu asfala saafiliin

5. kemudian Kami kembalikan dia ke tempat yang serendah-rendahnya,

إِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ الصّٰلِحٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُوْنٍ ﴿التين:٦

illal ladziina aamanuu wa’amilus shoolihaati falahum ajrun ghoiru mamnuun

6. kecuali orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan; maka mereka akan mendapat pahala yang tidak ada putus-putusnya,

فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّيْنِ ﴿التين:٧

famaa yukadzdzibuka ba’du bid diin

7. Maka apa yang menyebabkan (mereka) mendustakanmu (tentang) hari pembalasan setelah (adanya keterangan-keterangan) itu?

أَلَيْسَ اللهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحٰكِمِيْنَ ﴿التين:٨

alaisalloohu bi-ahkamil haakimiin

8. Bukankah Allah hakim yang paling adil?

#Semoga bermanfaat

42. What is the song about?
A. The singer's new flashlight.
B. The singer's day after tomorrow.
C. The singer's dark side.
D. The singer's special one.
43. How does the writer feel about tomorrow?
A. Happy
B. Sad
C. Scared
D. Stuck
44. Why does the singer sing this song?
A. To show her feeling about tomorrow
B. To help people overcome their problem
C To ask for help because she is always frightened
D. To express her gratitude to have that someone by her side​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

42. D. The singer's special one

43. C. Scared

44. D. To express her gratitude to have someone by her side.

hope this find you helpful ^•^
